sentences.en: And there are Colt, Gisela, Pi - Ku, Weiroot and so on in other countries.
sentences.cn: 国外的有Colt 、 Gisela系列 、 PiKu系列 、 Weiroot系列等.

sentences.en: And when my family wanted me to marry a second cousin, I bucked like a colt.
sentences.cn: 所以,我家里要我跟一位从表兄结婚时, 我便像只马驹似的跳了起来,坚决反对.

sentences.en: Colt – A male horse that is 4 years old or younger.
sentences.cn: 马驹–一只四岁或更年青的公马.

sentences.en: Doctors say colt isn't out of the wound yet.
sentences.cn: 医生称这匹小马还未痊愈.

sentences.en: He had raised him from a colt, so he loved him.
sentences.cn: 把他从一匹小马饲养长大,国王对他充满了感情.

sentences.en: He tried to break a colt.
He warn't any more responsible than a colt.
sentences.cn: 他只不过还是个毛头孩子.

sentences.en: I want you to meet my new partner Jack Colt.
sentences.cn: 我想要你去见见我的新伙伴杰克柯尔特.

sentences.en: One day, a colt carried a bag of wheat to the mill.
sentences.cn: 一天, 老马让小马驮着半口袋麦子到磨坊去磨面.

sentences.en: She bought him as a £1,000 colt of six months and schooled him.
sentences.cn: 在它还是6个月的小马驹时，她用1,000英镑将它买下，并训练它。

sentences.en: She felt as much out of place as a colt in a flower garden.
sentences.cn: 她觉得好似一匹小马掉进了花园里一样别别扭扭.

sentences.en: Teedo, my little three - year - old colt, usually trotted off toward the open field.
sentences.cn: 蒂多--我那匹三 岁 口的小雄马, 通常都是快速地跑到开阔的田野里去.

sentences.en: The mare gave birth to a colt.
There is a mare with her colt at foot under the tree.
sentences.cn: 树下有一匹母马和一匹紧随其后的小马驹.

sentences.en: This is a colt out of a good dam.
sentences.cn: 这是由良种的母马所生的驹子.

sentences.en: Weighing just 6 pounds and standing 14 inches tall, a pinto colt born Friday may be the smallest horse on the planet. He's named Einstein.
sentences.cn: 这匹周五出生的黑白毛色的小马重只有6磅，身高14英寸，可能是这个星球上最小的马了，它的名字叫爱因斯坦。

words.tran_cn: 小马似的；轻佻的；不受拘束的，放浪不拘的
